message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.GT 

This paper deals with multi-armed bandit problems, which are a common topic in machine learning and optimization. The paper discusses regret guarantees, which are a key concept in online learning and optimization. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The paper also involves information theory (cs.IT) and game theory (cs.GT) concepts, which are relevant to the topic.
